text: Bharat Stage-VI (BS-VI) emission norms for 2 wheelers is the most stringent emission norms available across the globe.
India will be at par with European standards with the introduction of BS-VI from 1st April 2020.
Significant reduction in pollutants w.r.t. BS-IV limits.
Bharat Stage-VI (BS-VI) emission norms for 2 wheelers is the most stringent emission norms available across the globe.

subtext.text: NMHC (Non-Methane Hydrocarbon) – To control Ozone concentration to reduce photochemical smog.
PM (Particulate Matter) – To reduce health hazards.
